and start_city in

select from_unixtime(start_time,'%Y-%m') countKey , count(1) countValue from journey where start_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(#{begin}) and unix_timestamp(#{end})
and start_city in
#{city}
group by countKey

SELECT count(*) AS countValue, (CASE WHEN ride_time > 0 AND ride_time <= 30 * 60 THEN '30分钟内' WHEN ride_time > 30 * 60 AND ride_time <=60 * 60 THEN '30-60分钟' WHEN ride_time > 60 * 60 AND ride_time <= 90 * 60 THEN '60-90分钟' WHEN ride_time > 90 * 60 AND ride_time <= 120 * 60 THEN '90-120分钟' WHEN ride_time > 120 * 60 THEN '120分钟以上' else '异常数据' END ) AS countKey FROM journey where start_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(#{begin}) and unix_timestamp(#{end})
and start_city in
#{city}
GROUP BY countKey

select count(1) countValue, distance_round as countKey from journey where start_time BETWEEN unix_timestamp(#{begin}) and unix_timestamp(#{end})
and start_city in
#{city}
group by countKey order by countKey
